news.content: Representing CSU, Hashdump's team at the Department of Energy Cyberforce Competition placed a cool 69th out of the entire country! Nice.

Hashdump particpates in the Rocky Mountain Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition (RMCCDC) each year - if you are interested in being a part of our team for the 2020 competition occuring in March, take a look at the sign up sheet here!
